thread.title: Test for carbon monoxide in the body could help diagnose disease

title: Test for carbon monoxide in the body could help diagnose disease
text:
Test for carbon monoxide in the body could help diagnose disease 11:50am GMT - 01:38 
A quick and reliable way of detecting carbon monoxide gas in the body could act as an early warning system for doctors trying to diagnose diseases, according to researchers in London. Stuart McDill has more.
